Text:
The sample is not in full 2.35.1 aspect ratio. Apparently the film has been released on Blu-ray in 16:9 aspect ratio... however.... there's a version uploaded on Pirate Bay in full 2.35.1 aspect ratio! 

I don't know which is meant to be the correct ratio, it's a bit confusing.
Too bad the Ap2p People track this user; I got two copyright infringement notices with files connected to this user.  Any way to stop it?

lack of definition, picture could have been sharper.
problem with the sound too (same as the CHD version) : distortion, basses too loud
